overhead_strike: Vertical overhead attack with the weapon
side_slash: A horizontal attack with the weapon. Naturally follows body rotation and can chain into follow-up attacks but wide arc makes it slower
thrust: A forward stabbing attack with the weapon. Faster than slash with forward momentum
upward_strike: A rising attack from low position
diagonal_slash: An angled cutting attack from high to low. Versatile and harder to predict than horizontal slash
Blade rises high | Torso rotates sideways

side_slash: Blade pulls wide to the side
thrust: Point aims directly at target in straight line

overhead_strike: Brief pause at apex blade perfectly vertical
side_slash: Hips reach maximum coil leading shoulder drops
thrust: Weight shifts decisively forward rear leg muscles visibly tense
upward_strike: Knees straighten body rises blade begins upward arc
diagonal_slash: Clear diagonal line from high shoulder to low opposite hip

overhead_strike: Weapon swings down with full force
side_slash: Weapon swings to the side with full force
thrust: Weapon thrusts forward with full force
upward_strike: Weapon swings up with full force
diagonal_slash: Weapon swings diagonally with full force
